Name: Donald Trump
Description: Cabinet Members with negative votes count as positive instead.

Name: Angela Merkel
Description: Influence Cards each give 1 extra point of Influence.

Name: Vladimir Putin
Description: You get 3 extra votes at end of game.

Name: Bashar Al-Assad
Description: You can remove any cabinet members at any time

Name: Kim Jong Un

Name: Xi Jinping
Description: Other players can't outbid you during YOUR TURN.
